title: Analysis of Virtual Reality-Based Educational Effectiveness and Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Core instructional technology principles and virtual reality technology comprehension
context.additional_context: Analysis of the effectiveness and exploration of implementation strategies for VR-based education targeting mid-level professionals (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: They can explain the learning effects of virtual reality-based education (games, simulations, virtual worlds) in connection with meta-analysis results.
They can select appropriate feedback strategies based on domain characteristics (declarative/procedural tasks) and create virtual reality education designs.
They can propose optimized educational scenarios considering differences in virtual reality education effectiveness based on individual/group performance modes.

resources: VR Device or Software Access Permissions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
